content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Baihu Li from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in New York. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Baihu Li from China

content: Thank you for your interest in my apartment, Mr. Li. As a landlord, I am looking to maximize my gains, so I would like to discuss the rental price with you. Based on the size of the apartment, which is 25 square meters, I would like to propose a rental price of 1500 Euros per month. Is this price acceptable to you?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I agree to the price of 1200 Euros per month. Thank you for your understanding, Mister Heine.
name: Baihu Li from China

content: Thank you for your agreement, Mr. Li. I appreciate your interest in the apartment and I am happy to have you as a tenant. Please let me know if you have any questions or concerns before we finalize the rental agreement.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I have a question. Do you have any extra fees or charges that I should be aware of?

Thank you for your help, Mister Heine.
name: Baihu Li from China

content: As a landlord, I do charge extra fees and charges for the apartment. These include a security deposit of 200 Euros, which will be returned to you at the end of your tenancy, and a monthly maintenance fee of 50 Euros to cover any repairs or upkeep needed for the apartment. In addition, I also charge a late payment fee of 20 Euros for any rent payments that are made after the due date. Is there anything else you need to know about the fees and charges?
name: Heinrich Heine
